battles.intro: Welcome to your first battle. Prepare to meet your opponent: Ty Lee!
enemy text: You know, you're kinda cute, Aang. Not cute enough to distract me from winning, though.
I'm out of your league, kiddo. Now let's fight!
Ugh, it's probably because I didn't wear pink today.
You should wear pink more; maybe it'll make you a better fighter.
player text: Wait, I can't tell if you just called me cute or ugly.
You're very pretty <3 <3 <3 I like your hair <3 <3 <3 uwu
battles.outro_win: Congratulations, you defeated Ty Lee! You may proceed to the next battle.
battles.outro_lose: Ty Lee wins! Try again next time.

battles.intro: Welcome to your second battle. Prepare to meet your opponent: Mai!
enemy text: Why do I even have to fight you?
Ugh I'm so over this already. Let's go.
Whatever. Can I go home now?
player text: You're bad, I'm good--it just makes sense!
battles.outro_win: Congratulations, you defeated Mai! You may proceed to the next battle.
battles.outro_lose: Mai wins! She doesn't seem to care, though.

battles.intro: Welcome to your third battle. Prepare to meet your opponent: Admiral Zhao!
battles.outro_win: Congratulations, you defeated Admiral Zhao! You may proceed to the next battle.
battles.outro_lose: Admiral Zhao wins! Better luck next time.

battles.intro: Welcome to your fourth battle. Prepare to meet your opponent: Iroh!
battles.outro_win: Congratulations, you defeated Iroh! You may proceed to the next battle.

battles.intro: Welcome to your fifth battle. Prepare to meet your opponent: Combustion Man!
battles.outro_win: Congratulations, you defeated Combustion Man! You may proceed to the next battle.

battles.intro: Welcome to your sixth battle. Prepare to meet your opponent: Fire Lord Ozai!
battles.outro_win: Congratulations, you defeated Fire Lord Ozai! You may proceed to the next battle.
battles.outro_lose: Fire Lord Ozai wins! She didn't really want to, though.

battles.intro: Welcome to your seventh battle. Prepare to meet your opponent: Azula!
battles.outro_win: Congratulations, you defeated Azula! You may proceed to the next battle.
